title: Jump-in

comments:
Fix this Java code so that your avatar
reaches the flag

To fix this program select a line of code, 
Click the small up and down arrows that appear near the line numbers to swap their order.

To run the entire Java program, click the green play button 
(Your avatar always starts from the same spot).

Change the order of the go() and turnRight() statements: Click on 
a line of code. Move it up and down, then test your program!
go(): moves the avatar 1 space forward.
turnRight(): turns the avatar to the right.

dyk: Most of the time we need to write a ; after each statement
When the computer executes your program, it executes one statement at a time before executing the next one.
Computer programs are a like movie scripts and cooking recipes - the correct sequence matters!
